name: Barbell Bench Press
precautions: Ensure you have a spotter or safety bars set correctly.
Do not flare your elbows out too wide (keep them around 45 degrees).
cues: Retract your scapula (pinch shoulder blades together).
Drive your feet into the ground.
Lower the bar to your mid-chest.

name: Pull Up
precautions: Do not shrug your shoulders up to your ears.
cues: Imagine pulling your elbows down to your pockets.
Full range of motion: chin over bar, full hang at bottom.

name: Barbell Back Squat
precautions: Ensure knees track over toes, not caving in.
cues: Brace your core like you're about to be punched.
Break at the hips and knees simultaneously.
